name: react-table-editor
description: spreadsheet like table component for react

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && vite build
scripts.patch: npm run tsc && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run clean
scripts.minor: npm run tsc && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run clean
scripts.major: npm run tsc && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run clean

author: steelydylan
